setup.title: Connection data
setup.name: Device name
setup.address-hint: IP address or host name of the SSH server
setup.port-hint: Port number on which the SSH service is listening on the server
setup.username-hint: Name of the user to be logged on to the server
setup.password-hint: If username/password authentication is to be used, the password must be entered here. If a private key AND a password is entered, the key is always used.

validation.required: The field __input__ must be filled in
validation.port: The field __input__ must be filled in and the value must be between 1 and 65535
